# Give Points
## Import Code
```

```

## Installation
In Streamer.bot in select `Import` from the top left.
Copy the `Import Code` and paste it into the `Import String`. 
Enable the Following Command (this is contained inside the import).
```
!givepoints = Tied to GivePoints
```
## Example Usage
```
!givepoints TerrierDarts 5000
```

---
# Steal Points
## Import Code
```

```

## Installation
In Streamer.bot in select `Import` from the top left.
Copy the `Import Code` and paste it into the `Import String`. 
Add the Following Command.
```
!steal = Tied to Steal Points
```
## Configuration
`costToSteal` This is how many points its going to cost for you to attempt the steal.
`maxSteal` This is the max amount you can steal
`minSteal` This is the min amount you can steal
`failChance` This is the chance you will fail all together, the higher the number the higher the chance of success.
>  To have it successful every time have `failChance` set to 100.
{.is-info}
## Example Usage
```
!steal TerrierDarts
```
---
# Set All Users Points
> This will edit the amount of `points` for everyone the bot has seen since based on the user data loaded from when you opened the bot or since the last save which ever is more recent. {.is-info}
## Import Code
```

```
## Installation
In Streamer.bot in select `Import` from the top left.
Copy the `Import Code` and paste it into the `Import String`. 
Add the Following Command.
```
!setAllPoints = Tied to SetAllPointsTo
```
## Example Usage
```
!setAllPointsTo 5000
```
---
# Add Points To All 
> This will edit the amount of `points` for everyone the bot has seen since based on the user data loaded from when you opened the bot or since the last save which ever is more recent. {.is-info}
## Import Code
```

```
## Installation
In Streamer.bot in select `Import` from the top left.
Copy the `Import Code` and paste it into the `Import String`. 
Add the Following Command.
```
!addpointstoall = Tied to AddPointsToAll
```
## Example Usage
```
!addpointstoall 5000
```
